tool_description: Get detailed facts for every cat breed. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/cats.
title: Cats by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/cats

optional_parameters.name: playfulness
optional_parameters.description: How playful the cat is. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates serious and stern and 5 indicates maximum playfulness.

optional_parameters.name: grooming
optional_parameters.description: How much work is required to properly groom the cat. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates maximum grooming effort and 5 indicates minimum grooming effort.

optional_parameters.name: family_friendly
optional_parameters.description: How affectionate the cat is to family. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates minimal affection and 5 indicates maximum affection.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: children_friendly
optional_parameters.description: How well the cat gets along with children. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates the cat does not get along well with kids and 5 indicates the cat is very kid-friendly.

optional_parameters.name: other_pets_friendly
optional_parameters.description: How well the cat gets along with other pets in the household (for example, dogs). Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates the cat isn't very friendly to other pets and 5 indicates the cat gets along very well with other pets.

optional_parameters.name: shedding
optional_parameters.description: How much hair the cat sheds. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates no shedding and 5 indicates maximum shedding.
